Gogolan: Please, calm down and let us explain. We are not from this 
era. We come from many centuries after the tenth great war. We 
Angelions are the children of both Maximals and Predacons. 
Transformers from our time live in peace and harmony altogether. 
However, since the discovery of transwarp technology, time has been 
altered. This whole war IS a disruption of its own.
As for our weapons... they are inside us, parts of us like bones or 
veins. We demand that you trust us that we will not use them. Should 
this be a trap, however, it would be an illogical one. We are only 
two, and all the factions here are more than enough to obliterate us.

Meanwhile, Ramiel made another call for the conference.

Ramiel:
To all factions, we are Angelions. We are organizing a conference, 
and we need one unarmed representant of each faction to join us.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> ::Liono::
> Liono eyes grow wide as he thinks for a moment. "Your here about 
the time 
> disruptions?" Liono's tone changes and grows a little more 
offensive as he 
> uncross his arms. "I'm Liono guardian of the Ark and one of three 
Matrix 
> masters. Cybertron should be grateful that they haven't suffered 
anymore 
> than they have. The Maximals squabble like perpetual children and 
are sorely 
> out numbers if you want to help join them." Liono touches his 
braces and 
> feels the surge of power. "How do I know your not armed or setting 
some trap 
> after all your not maximals so your word is worthless and honor is 
just as 
> fleeting as a spring rain."
> 
>
